title: AirNow.gov: official real time data
short: Real time governmental readings based on location

title: Intro to AQI
description: This is the EPA's guide on AQI, or Air Quality index. It's a 3 minute read into major pollutants, health risks for danger levels, and more.

title: Purple Air
short: A beautiful map off of private sensors
description: Purple Air is a private company that sells air quality sensors to people and companies interested in recording their local air quality. They also run a paid API service that allows programmers to build dashboards like this one off of the data recorded on Purple Air sensors. Weather Underground states that PurpleAir PA-II is the best devise for most people to track the deadliest type of air pollution

title: Windy.com
description: Windy.com is an interactive map based weather dashboard that allows users to select an from an impressive amount of layers to build any map they want. Windy.com is famous for including particle animation to show wind and waves.

title: National Wildfire Coordinating Group
description: This is a great resource to access primary sourced data, photos, and tools. It is also a great resource for people interested in being a Wildland firefighter or looking to submit ideas on how to fight fires.

title: Fire, Weather, & Avalanche Center
description: This is an Oregon 501(c)(3) focuses on providing high quality tools for people looking to go into the wilderness. Their main drive the name of their org.

title: CDC: Wildfire Smoke and COVID-19
short: From building clean rooms to commercial HVAC

title: Protect AQI inside for wildfire smoke
short: How to keep the smoke outside
description: This is a EPA guide on how and why to create a clean room to minimize the effects of smoke on our health. Generally, make a cold room in your home where you can continuously filter the air

title: DIY air filter for the handy people
short: Moderately guide to make a budget air filtering system

title: LA Times Q&A on AQI
short: General resources on surviving smoke from LA
